item.title: European markets higher as shortened Christmas week begins; UK economy stalls
item.description: European stocks edged higher on Monday as a shortened trading week began in the run-up to Christmas.

item.title: US launches new probe into legacy Chinese chips as tech pressure on Beijing escalates
item.description: The Biden administration launched a new probe into legacy Chinese semiconductors that may go into everything from cars to household goods and defense ...

item.title: Honda and Nissan officially begin merger talks to create world's third-largest automaker
item.description: Both companies are grappling with intense global competition in the electric vehicle market from the likes of Tesla and China's BYD.

item.title: Stock futures inch higher as the market heads into holiday-shortened week: Live updates
item.description: Trading is expected to be relatively muted during the holiday week.

item.title: Britain's economy flatlined in the third quarter, revised figures show
item.description: U.K. GDP flatlined in the three months to September, official figures showed on Monday.
